BadgeDetail.Name: Circular Saw
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has attended a full demonstration of correct tool use. They have demonstrated on multiple occasions the correct and safe use of a Circular saw. They have shown knowledge of basic maintenance of this tool including changing a saw blade. They are competent to use this tool in the workshop environment.

Task.Title: Circular saw
Task.Body: Upload 2 photographs/videos demonstrating the safe use of a circular saw.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload 2 photographs/videos demonstrating the safe use of a circular saw.
Task.TextileBody: Upload 2 photographs/videos demonstrating the safe use of a circular saw.

Task.Title: Blade change
Task.Body: Upload 1 photograph/video showing a blade change.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload 1 photograph/video showing a blade change.
Task.TextileBody: Upload 1 photograph/video showing a blade change.
